tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_type VARCHAR(20),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE email_exchanges (
    id INT,
    sender_email VARCHAR,
    recipient_email VARCHAR,
    subject VARCHAR,
    body TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE chat_logs (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  message_text TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE email_exchanges (
  email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_email VARCHAR(255),
  receiver_email VARCHAR(255),
  subject VARCHAR(255),
  body TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE team_members (
  member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_name VARCHAR(50),
  member_email VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE chat_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    message TEXT,
    sender_name VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_name VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE email_exchanges (
    email_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    subject VARCHAR(100),
    content TEXT,
    sender_email VARCHAR(50),
    receiver_email VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE chat_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE email_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    subject TEXT,
    body TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
